thread.title: Jimmy Iovine’s Planned Exit From Apple Music Raises Leadership Questions

author: The Editor
title: Jimmy Iovine’s Planned Exit From Apple Music Raises Leadership Questions
text:
Apple Inc. is losing the public face of its music operations, just as its streaming service is finding its beat. 
Executive Jimmy Iovine will transition into a consulting role in August and step back from daily involvement with the company’s streaming-music business, according to people familiar with his plans.

Mr. Iovine is one of the last... RELATED VIDEO Behind the Scenes of the $3 Billion Apple-Beats Deal Jimmy Iovine, music executive and co-founder of Beats Electronics, talks to WSJ's Lee Hawkins about the week leading up to the $3 billion Apple deal and the HBO documentary about his partnership with Dr. Dre. (Originally published July 12, 2017)
